costs.name: On Demand 5 + Charges
costs.description: On Demand 5 per deployment, 50 per core, 10 per GB ram and 1 per GB disk

manifest.manifest_content:
apiVersion: v1
items:
    -
        apiVersion: v1
        kind: Service
        metadata:
            creationTimestamp: null
            labels: {service: homestead}
            name: test-service-instance-service
            namespace: default
        spec:
            type: LoadBalancer
            ports: [{port: 55555, protocol: TCP}]
            selector: {service: homestead}
    -
        apiVersion: extensions/v1beta1
        kind: Deployment
        metadata:
            creationTimestamp: null
            name: test-service-instance-deployment
            namespace: default
        spec:
            replicas: 1
            strategy: {}
            template: {metadata: {creationTimestamp: null, labels: {service: homestead}}, spec: {containers: [{image: 'ademord/coincidencia:latest', name: homestead, ports: [{containerPort: 5432, protocol: TCP}], resources: {}}], restartPolicy: Always}}
        status: {}
kind: List

costs.name: On Demand 5 + Charges
